column4: I wish to install the 32-bit java plugin into Firefox 64-bit. I've followed the wiki, and the link is valid, but the plugin doesn't install no matter where I link it.
you can't install 32 bit java plugin in 64bit java - you have 2 choices. 1: downlaod 32bit firefox and use that or 2: wait until the next release of java which will have a 64bit plugin
I have downloaded an early build of it and the directory is there for the plugin, but I haven't actually tried to use it and it has also been said on several news sites
Well, since it does appear to be actively in the works, that's enough for me :)
